title: Secure Multi-Factor Authentication Setup
summary: Implement a secure login mechanism with multi-factor authentication to protect sensitive customer data.
description: Develop a robust authentication module that enables customers to securely log in using multi-factor authentication. Implement features such as OTP-based verification, biometrics, and device recognition to enhance protection of user credentials and financial data. Ensure compliance with banking security regulations and provide session management to prevent unauthorized access.

title: Responsive User Interface Design
summary: Develop a responsive web interface accessible across all device types.
description: Design and build a modern, intuitive, and responsive user interface for the self-service portal. Ensure optimal user experience across desktop, tablet, and mobile devices with consistent layout, performance, and accessibility. Implement adaptive navigation, quick links, and usability-oriented design to support diverse customer needs.

title: Personalized Dashboard with Product Recommendations
summary: Create a dashboard that personalizes content based on user profile and banking relationship.
description: Develop a customizable, data-driven dashboard that displays relevant banking products, account summaries, and service recommendations based on the customer’s eligibility and transaction history. Integrate real-time data feeds to ensure information accuracy and enable quick access to actions such as transfers, service requests, and notifications.

title: Digital Account Opening and Service Modification Workflows
summary: Enable customers to initiate account openings and modify existing services online.
description: Design and implement digital workflows that allow customers to apply for new accounts, update existing services, and manage requests through a seamless, guided interface. The process should automate input validation, provide contextual help, and minimize manual intervention, ensuring efficiency and improved user experience.

title: Document Upload and Verification Module
summary: Integrate secure document upload functionality for authentication and verification.
description: Develop a secure document management feature that allows customers to upload required documentation directly through the portal. Include support for multiple file formats, automated validation, and backend verification workflows to ensure authenticity while maintaining compliance with data protection regulations.

title: Save and Resume Application Functionality
summary: Allow customers to pause and resume incomplete applications or service requests.
description: Implement a save-and-resume feature that captures users’ in-progress requests and stores them securely for later completion. This functionality must support draft persistence, version control, and encrypted storage, enabling users to continue their applications anytime without data loss.

title: Real-Time Request Tracking and Notifications
summary: Enable real-time status tracking with automated notifications for customer requests.
description: Provide customers with the ability to track the real-time status of all submitted requests. Integrate automated email and in-portal notifications triggered by status changes, approvals, or rejections. Enhance transparency and customer engagement through clear and timely updates.

title: Interaction History and Audit Logging
summary: Maintain a detailed record of all customer actions and service interactions.
description: Implement a comprehensive interaction log capturing all user transactions, service requests, and updates. Provide customers with a viewable activity history and ensure the system retains these records for compliance, analytics, and support queries while maintaining audit integrity and data security.

title: Core Banking System Integration
summary: Integrate the self-service portal with existing core banking systems for seamless data synchronization.
description: Build a middleware integration layer to connect the portal with the bank’s core banking system. Enable secure and real-time exchange of account, transaction, and service data. Ensure bidirectional synchronization with minimal latency while maintaining operational isolation for system reliability.

title: Role-Based Access Control (RBAC)
summary: Implement granular role-based authorization to restrict access based on user profiles.
description: Develop a role-based access control system defining permissions and access levels for each customer type. Ensure that customers only view and perform actions authorized for their account types and roles, maintaining compliance and enhancing data security across the portal.

title: Independent Portal Database and Performance Optimization
summary: Establish an optimized portal database to balance performance and reliability.
description: Design and implement a dedicated database architecture for the self-service portal to manage application-specific data while offloading non-critical queries from the core banking system. Introduce indexing, caching, and asynchronous processing strategies to ensure system scalability and high performance.
